summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2011 BMW 328I. WHILE DRIVING VARIOUS SPEEDS, THE DRIVER'S SEAT BELT WOULD TIGHTEN AROUND THE DRIVER. THE ISSUE MADE IT IMPOSSIBLE FOR THE DRIVER TO TURN LEFT OR RIGHT TO SEE OUT OF THE SIDE MIRRORS PROPERLY. ALSO, WHEN THE SEAT BELT WAS UNLATCHED, IT FAILED TO RETRACT CORRECTLY. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO BMW OF SARASOTA (5151 CLARK RD, SARASOTA, FL 34233  (888) 849-1985) WHERE IT WAS DIAGNOSED THAT THE DRIVER'S SEAT BELT NEEDED REPLACEMENT. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE AND OFFERED THE CONTACT A 10% DISCOUNT. THE CONTACT WAS UNHAPPY WITH THE MANUFACTURER'S OFFER. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 42,148.
